section.name: Resources
section.p:
The DPML provides various resources for:
providing support to the users of our products
helping DPML community members work together
improving the quality of our products and services

The resources we offer include mailing lists for posting relevant e-mail messages, an issue tracking service for signaling bugs or change requests, a Contineous integration system and a code management system for keeping the source code in order and up to date.
There is even a wiki starting to form that has some more information on infrastructure, processes and community, like Open Participation Software and other thoughts.
